entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 10:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 10:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 10:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
